titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before His Majesty at Newport in the Isle of VVight, November the 29. 1648. being the Fast-day. By H. Ferne, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Ferne, H. (Henry), 1602-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Royston in Ivie-lane,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "1648"; the 9 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
